resources.string: Select a sample from above to listen and guess what the artist is saying. Punctuation and capitalization are ignored. See how many replays it takes to guess the answer!
Got me swingin crysie and hennessy bottles in the club with my thug homies goin for the skrilla
Stalkin gat fools walking jack moves Ready ta pap you if we have to daily
Smoke the first 48 hours grind 22 and sleep 2 hours Put 24s on the new Audi, white on white like baby powder
